trend_summary: Agriculture expands eastward as fields consolidate, while western uplands slowly reforest. Built surfaces change little: only modest village infill and a widened riverside road appear. Patchy crop rotation drives most spectral variation. Overall, the area remains sparsely built and distinctly rural throughout the time series.
notable_changes: Rectangular crop fields in the eastern sector enlarge and merge, replacing smaller plots.
Several forest clearings on western ridges become re-vegetated, restoring continuous woodland.
Minor settlement infill along the main eastâ€“west road adds a handful of new rooftops.
Riverside highway segment is straightened/widened mid-series, showing brighter pavement and levee work.
Two small water bodies appear near the central valley, replacing former pasture.
